name: Hamfarm
description:
HamFarm is a game that lets you grow sunflowers in a tiny and beautifully hand-crafted world. This minimalist hamsterpiece of short game not-quite-a-walking-sim will take the chill atmospheric relaxation all the way to eleven from the first clouds in spring til the leaves disappear in the fall.

A few clear benefits of playing HamFarm:

  1. Be a hamster! Hamsters are cute!
  2. Grow sunflowers in a green meadow! 
  3. Help other animals!
  4. Watch the changing days and seasons!
  5. Listen to music! The music changes with the seasons too!

Almost everything in this game is affected by the seasons and time of day, but the stability of the atmosphere even as everything shifts just goes to show that the more things change, the more they stay the same. This game was made entirely during Oct of 2021 for the Godot Fire Jam using the free and hamsterful Godot Engine.

You'll need a 64 bit Windows or Linux machine to play HamFarm. It doesn't need to be the awesomest, but you'll need at least GLES3 support.

You can control the hamster in this game using keyboard or joystick

While this is a hamajorly chill game, most of the actions have to be mashed repeatedly.

Arrow Keys/WASD/Left Joystick to move
Spacebar/Your favorite Button to throw/dig/fill/climb/drink/spew
